name: City Museum
description: Explore art, history, and culture at the city museum.

name: Town Park
description: Open green spaces with walking trails and playgrounds.

name: Historic Theater
description: Enjoy performances and concerts in a restored historic venue.

name: City Library
description: A modern library with reading rooms and community events.

name: Aquatic Center
description: Indoor and outdoor pools, fitness classes, and water sports.

name: Botanical Gardens
description: Beautiful landscaped gardens and walking paths.

name: Local Brewery
description: Tasting room and tours featuring local craft beers.

name: Sports Complex
description: Facilities for soccer, basketball, and community events.
